name: io::impls::<impl io::Read for &[u8]>::read_buf_exact

core::io::BorrowedCursor::<'a>::capacity.doc: Returns the available space in the cursor.

core::io::BorrowedCursor::<'a>::append.doc:
Appends data to the cursor, advancing position within its buffer.

 # Panics

 Panics if `self.capacity()` is less than `buf.len()`.

core::ops::Index::index.doc:
Performs the indexing (`container[index]`) operation.

 # Panics

 May panic if the index is out of bounds.
